segments.text: Do you know which bus I can take to PCC ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me where you need to get on at .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I live on Las Flores and Fair Oaks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't mind walking , I know a bus you can take .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Walk all the way down Fair Oaks , and catch the 267 on Altadena Drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know which direction it should be heading ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to catch it going west .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which stop do I get off on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to get off on the corner of Del Mar and Hill .
segments.speaker: S2
